definition: forward delivery apartment/unfinished housing to be paid for in advance by the buyer and then completed within certain time frame
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: Selling according to the set can't avoid the problem of shrinkage in area.
sentences.chinese: 期房按套销售并不能回避面积缩水问题。

sentences.english: Do not give the mortgage lead to higher prices of existing homes is a corroboration of the phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 期房不给按揭导致更高的价格现房是一个佐证的现象。

sentences.english: There is a type of payment in real property market where a mortgage is placed on forward house property.
sentences.chinese: 期房按揭是房地产交易中的一种融资购房方式。

definition: second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
building under construction/commercial property/real estate (for sale or rent)
a mortgage (loanword via Cantonese)/to buy property on a mortgage
"village-certificated house", residence supposedly only transferable to other village residents but often sold on the open market
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
